title: Oil Steady After Biggest Gain in a Week With Focus on Venezuela
description: Oil steadied after the biggest gain in a week as traders weighed the outlook for Venezuela, while concerns about a global glut persisted.
content: Oil steadied after the biggest gain in a week as traders weighed the outlook for Venezuela, while concerns about a global glut persisted.
